_comment: `goalTitle` must have the same name as corresponding goal in allGoals.json. The file is used in StaticResourceBasedRecommendationGenerator

goalBased.text: You should drink less fluid. The normal amount of water per day is 1.5-2 liters.
You must drink more fluid. The normal amount of water per day is 1.5-2 liters.
You should eat more cottage cheese, eggs, meat, chicken and drink more milk.

You should eat more tomatoes, garlic, potatoes, pumpkin, parsley, apricots, dried apricots, apricots, grapes, dried apricots, raisins, prunes, bananas, melons, apples, meat, nuts, cocoa, legumes, black tea.
